nodes.bodyText: actually, since we are using the annotations in fapi now, would this now be able to use the annotations as well
We can't depend on fabric api. Annotations are for a later date but I don't like how discussions are going just for annotations in fabric loader
I took fapi as an example, the jetbrains annotations are applied through loom 0.5, I do admit that it doesn't have much to do with this PR tho.
I will look into fixing latest loom as a loader dev env, I dont see an issue with using JB's annotations in loader?
Can this now be done? or do we need to repackage it in mixin? (Id like to repackage all of mixins libs, possibly appart from asm)
I asked player about that. He wants to deal with the actual removal of gson and it's corresponding exemption a bit later.
